item.title: This car is the next big thing in driving — and you can invest in it right now
item.description: Autonomous vehicles are gaining speed — and Tesla and Uber have the inside lane. And pay attention to Nvidia and other AV infrastructure plays.

item.title: How social media convinces investors they’re the next Warren Buffett — or smarter

item.description: Duolingo’s stock was rising Monday after KeyBanc Capital Markets upgraded the digital-education app.

item.title: Denmark raised its retirement age to 70. Should the U.S. do the same?
item.description: We should also restore balance to our system, but inequality precludes an across-the-board increase
